item.title: Books read in 2016Q2
item.description: Books I’ve read this quarter1: Extreme Programming Explained: Embrace Change, 2nd Edition by Kent Beck and Cynthia Andres, again. Building Microservices, Designing Fine-Grained Systems, by Sam Newman, with the ‘@deAprendices’s reading club’. Blog posts under the tag building-microservices Reinventing Organizations by Frederic Laloux. Blog posts under the tag reinventing-organizations Non-technical: L’acabadora, by Michela Murgia Disrupted: My Misadventure in the Start-Up Bubble by Dan Lyons Books started, not yet finished (WIP):
